verses.name: Nehemiah 13:26
verses.text: Did not Solomon king of Israel sin by these things? yet among many nations was there no king like him, who was beloved of his God, and God made him king over all Israel: nevertheless even him did outlandish women cause to sin.

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:27
verses.text: Shall we then hearken unto you to do all this great evil, to transgress against our God in marrying strange wives?

verses.name: Nehemiah 13:28
verses.text: And one of the sons of Joiada, the son of Eliashib the high priest, was son in law to Sanballat the Horonite: therefore I chased him from me.
